entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
